rukus.text: Sond be, me zariye Israil ji ezabe riswaker rizgar kir
Ji Fir´ewn Lewra beguman ew zordareki ji hedderketiyan bu
Sond be, me wan bi zanin di ser gele cihane re girt-hilbijart
U me hin niþanan da wan ku te de xweþiki xuya hebu
Ku ji mirina me ya peþin peve tu tiþt nene u em (piþti mirine ji) nayen rakirin
Veca eger hun bera rastgo ne de ka bav u kalen me binin
Ma ew cetir in (biheztir in) yan komela Tubbe´ , u en beri wan ku me wan tek bir. Lewra beguman ew sucdaren gunehkar bun
Me asimana u zemin u tiþte di nava wan de bi leystik neaferandiye
Me wan her bi rastiye aferandiye, le bele pirri wan nizanin
Beguman roja ji hev veqetandine wexte wada wan teva ye
Roja ku tu merive nez bi kera merive xwe naye u ew neyen yari kirin ji
Ji peþtire e ku Xuda le dilovani kiribe. Lewra beguman ew, serkeftiye dilovan her ew e
